title: The OC Savior: Ep. 2, It's Totally Fine
itunes:title: The OC Savior: Ep. 2, It's Totally Fine
description:
When Lizzie’s husband Jesse calls up salon owners Lauren and Geneva to tell them that his wife has been stealing from them, that’s just the tip of the iceberg. Suddenly, Laguna Beach PD’s fraud detective Jordan Mirakian is fielding calls from a number of victims. He learns that Lizzie used an elaborate system of phony emails, invoices, bank accounts, and even voice-disguising technology to con her victims out of hundreds of thousands. But it’s how she gets inside the life and finances of a winery owner that hits a diabolical new low. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
